alert.note: Alert for Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 9:32AM EST until December 19 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Owasco Inlet at Moravia and surrounding areas. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding along the inlet will extend into Moravia near Aurora Street. Water will back up along Mill Creek, affecting some homes and businesses between Aurora and Central streets. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 924 AM EST, Heavy rain between 1.5 and 2.5 inches was causing a rapid rise and flooding along rivers and streams in the area, including the Owasco Inlet. At 9:00 AM, the river gage on the inlet was 8.5 feet and rising quickly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Locke, Moravia, Cascade and Fillmore Glen State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
